title: Restricts termination of a tenant's residential utility service during cold weather periods
summary: Provides that no utility may discontinue residential utility service during cold weather periods to a premises where an owner of the premises has notified the utility that the customer of record is a tenant, or where the address of the customer of record differs from the address of the premises being served, unless a five day notice of impending termination has been mailed to the owner and occupant or occupants of such premises.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to termination of service
